mapper.sql: POSITION_ID, POSITION_NAME, POSITION_CODE, PARENT_POSITION_CODE, REGION_NBR, SORT_NUM, NOTES, STATUS_CD, CREATE_DATE, CREATE_USER, UPDATE_DATE, UPDATE_USER, STATUS_DATE
mapper.select: SELECT C.POSITION_CODE id , C.POSITION_NAME name, C.PARENT_POSITION_CODE pid, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(B.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF A, SYS_ROLE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ROLE_CODE = B.ROLE_CODE AND A.POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE) EXTFIELD1 FROM SYS_POSITION C WHERE C.STATUS_CD = '1000' and C.PARENT_POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode}

SELECT C.POSITION_CODE id ,C.POSITION_NAME name,C.PARENT_POSITION_CODE pid, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(B.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF A, SYS_ROLE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ROLE_CODE = B.ROLE_CODE AND A.POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE) EXTFIELD1 FROM SYS_POSITION C WHERE C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.PARENT_POSITION_CODE is null

SELECT C.POSITION_CODE ID, C.POSITION_NAME NAME, C.PARENT_POSITION_CODE PID, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(B.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF A, SYS_ROLE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ROLE_CODE = B.ROLE_CODE AND A.POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE) EXTFIELD1, (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(1),0,0,1) FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE ) isParent FROM SYS_POSITION C WHERE C.STATUS_CD = '1000'

choose.when:
SELECT A.POSITION_ID positionId, A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE parentPositionCode, A.POSITION_CODE positionCode, A.POSITION_NAME positionName, A.REGION_NBR regionNbr, (SELECT TCR.REGION_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_REGION TCR WHERE TCR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND TCR.REGION_NBR=A.REGION_NBR) REGIONNAME, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF SDPR WHERE SDPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SDPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGPOSITIONNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_USER_POSITION_REF SUPR WHERE SUPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SUPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGUSERNUM FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE = #{vo.positionCode}
AND A.POSITION_NAME like '%'||#{vo.search}||'%'
choose.otherwise:
SELECT * from ( SELECT A.POSITION_ID positionId, A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE parentPositionCode, A.POSITION_CODE positionCode, A.POSITION_NAME positionName, A.REGION_NBR regionNbr, (SELECT TCR.REGION_NAME FROM TB_COMMON_REGION TCR WHERE TCR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND TCR.REGION_NBR=A.REGION_NBR) REGIONNAME, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF SDPR WHERE SDPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SDPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGPOSITIONNUM, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM SYS_USER_POSITION_REF SUPR WHERE SUPR.STATUS_CD='1000' AND SUPR.POSITION_CODE=A.POSITION_CODE) ORGUSERNUM FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' START WITH A.POSITION_CODE = #{vo.positionCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.POSITION_CODE = A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE ) where 1=1
AND positionName like '%'||#{vo.search}||'%'

mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT WM_CONCAT(SR.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF SPRR, SYS_ROLE SR WHERE SPRR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND SR.ROLE_CODE = SPRR.ROLE_CODE AND SPRR.POSITION_CODE = A.POSITION_CODE) ROLENAMES FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE = #{positionCode}

SELECT A.POSITION_ID positionId,A.POSITION_NAME positionName,A.POSITION_CODE positionCode,A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE parentPositionCode,A.REGION_NBR regionNbr,A.SORT_NUM sortNum,A.NOTES notes, (select b.region_name from TB_COMMON_REGION b where b.common_region_id=A.Region_Nbr) regionName,
(select B.POSITION_NAME from SYS_POSITION B where B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.POSITION_CODE = A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE) pPositionName FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.POSITION_ID = #{positionId}

SELECT B.POSITION_ID positionId,B.POSITION_NAME positionName,B.POSITION_CODE positionCode,B.PARENT_POSITION_CODE parentPositionCode FROM SYS_POSITION B, SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF A WHERE A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND A.POSITION_CODE = B.POSITION_CODE AND A.ORG_CODE = #{orgCode}

select b.role_id roleId, b.role_name roleName, b.role_code roleCode, b.parent_role_code parentRoleCode, b.region_nbr regionNbr from SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF a, SYS_ROLE b where a.status_cd = 1000 and b.status_cd = 1000 and a.role_code = b.role_code and a.position_code = #{positionCode}
select count(1) from SYS_USER_POSITION_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.position_code=#{positionCode}
select count(1) from SYS_DEPT_POSITION_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.position_code=#{positionCode}
select count(1) from SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF a where a.status_cd='1000' and a.position_code=#{positionCode}

choose.when:
SELECT B.ORG_ID orgId, B.ORG_CODE orgCode,B.ORG_NAME orgName,A.USER_CODE userCode,C.USER_NAME userName,C.ACCOUT accout,C.USER_ID userId FROM SYS_USER_DEPT_REF A, SYS_ORGANIZATION B, SYS_USER C WHERE A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND C.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE AND A.USER_CODE = C.USER_CODE AND B.ORG_CODE = #{id}
AND ( B.ORG_NAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' or B.USER_NAME like '%'||#{search}||'%')
choose.otherwise:
WITH SYSORGTREE AS ( SELECT * FROM SYS_ORGANIZATION V WHERE V.STATUS_CD='1000' START WITH V.ORG_CODE=#{id} CONNECT BY PRIOR V.ORG_CODE = V.PARENT_ORG_CODE)
SELECT B.ORG_ID orgId, B.ORG_CODE orgCode,B.ORG_NAME orgName,A.USER_CODE userCode,C.USER_NAME userName,C.ACCOUT accout,C.USER_ID userId FROM SYS_USER_DEPT_REF A, SYS_ORGANIZATION B, SYS_USER C WHERE A.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND B.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND C.STATUS_CD = 1000 AND A.ORG_CODE = B.ORG_CODE AND A.USER_CODE = C.USER_CODE AND B.ORG_CODE in (select ORG_CODE from SYSORGTREE)
AND ( B.ORG_NAME like '%'||#{search}||'%' or B.USER_NAME like '%'||#{search}||'%')

choose.when:
select * from ( select a.user_code userCode,a.position_code positionCode,b.user_id userId,b.accout accout,b.user_name userName,e.position_name positionName, (select wm_concat(d.org_name) from SYS_USER_DEPT_REF c ,Sys_Organization d where c.status_cd=1000 and d.status_cd=1000 and c.org_code=d.org_code and c.user_code= a.user_code ) orgName from ( select * from SYS_USER_POSITION_REF a where a.status_cd=1000 and a.position_code = #{positionCode} ) a left join sys_user b on b.status_cd=1000 and b.user_code=a.user_code left join sys_position e on e.status_cd=1000 and e.position_code=a.position_code ) where 1=1
AND (userName like '%'||#{search}||'%' or accout like '%'||#{search}||'%')
choose.otherwise:
select * from ( with pos as ( select * from sys_position a where a.status_cd=1000 start with a.position_code = #{positionCode} connect by a.position_code = a.parent_position_code ) select a.user_code userCode,a.position_code positionCode,b.user_id userId,b.accout accout,b.user_name userName,e.position_name positionName, (select wm_concat(d.org_name) from SYS_USER_DEPT_REF c ,Sys_Organization d where c.status_cd=1000 and d.status_cd=1000 and c.org_code=d.org_code and c.user_code= a.user_code ) orgName from ( select * from SYS_USER_POSITION_REF a where a.status_cd=1000 and a.position_code in (select position_code from pos) ) a left join sys_user b on b.status_cd=1000 and b.user_code=a.user_code left join sys_position e on e.status_cd=1000 and e.position_code=a.position_code ) where 1=1
AND (userName like '%'||#{search}||'%' or accout like '%'||#{search}||'%')

mapper.select: SELECT C.POSITION_CODE ID, C.POSITION_NAME NAME, C.PARENT_POSITION_CODE PID, (SELECT WM_CONCAT(B.ROLE_NAME) FROM SYS_POSITIONT_ROLE_REF A, SYS_ROLE B WHERE A.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND B.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND A.ROLE_CODE = B.ROLE_CODE AND A.POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE) EXTFIELD1, (SELECT DECODE(COUNT(1),0,0,1) FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD='1000' AND A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE=C.POSITION_CODE ) isParent FROM SYS_POSITION C WHERE C.STATUS_CD = '1000' AND C.POSITION_CODE in (SELECT A.POSITION_CODE FROM SYS_POSITION A WHERE A.STATUS_CD=1000 START WITH A.POSITION_CODE=#{positionCode} CONNECT BY PRIOR A.POSITION_CODE=A.PARENT_POSITION_CODE)
